mapper.select: select ORDINAL_POSITION as ID,Column_Name as COLUMN_NAME,data_type as JDBC_TYPE,COLUMN_COMMENT as NOTES, (case when data_type = 'float' or data_type = 'double' or data_type = 'decimal' then NUMERIC_PRECISION else CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH end ) as LENGTH, NUMERIC_SCALE,( case when EXTRA='auto_increment' then 1 else 0 end) as IsIdentity,(case when COLUMN_KEY='PRI' then 1 else 0 end) as IS_PK, (case when IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' then 0 else 1 end)as CanNull,COLUMN_DEFAULT as DEFAULT_VALUE from information_schema.columns where table_schema = #{where.tableSchema,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and table_name = #{where.tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by ORDINAL_POSITION asc
